title: CCNA: Introduction to Networks
description: Cisco networking fundamentals and practical network configuration
skills: Configuring switches, routers, and network devices for end-to-end connectivity
Creating IPv4/IPv6 addressing schemes and network troubleshooting
Understanding OSI model, Ethernet protocols, and network security best practices

title: Introduction to Data
description: Gateway to understanding data fundamentals and decision-making
skills: Data Basics: Types, structures, and importance in decision-making processes
Data Wisdom: DIKW framework and real-world data-driven decision examples
Data Ethics: Privacy, data lifecycle, and handling common data mistakes

title: Data Structures and Algorithms in Python
description: Comprehensive understanding of computer science fundamentals
skills: Data Structures: Linked lists, stacks, queues, trees, graphs, and Big O notation
Search Algorithms: Linear search, binary search, DFS, BFS, and binary search trees
Sorting Algorithms: Bubble sort, selection sort, merge sort, and quicksort implementation

title: Python Programming Fundamentals
description: Comprehensive Python skill track covering programming fundamentals, intermediate concepts, advanced tooling, and data types
skills: Python syntax, variables, and built-in data types (strings, integers, floats, booleans)
Data structures: lists, dictionaries, sets, tuples, and their practical applications
Control flow: comparison operators, conditional statements, for and while loops
Functions: built-in functions, custom functions, docstrings, default and arbitrary arguments
Modules and packages: importing, using, and creating reusable code
Error handling and debugging: interpreting tracebacks and handling exceptions
Advanced techniques: iterators, list comprehensions, and Python Collections module
Real-world data manipulation and multistep problem solving
